00026 bool getbit(const base_integer& n, size_t bit) {
00027     size_t index = bit / bits_per_digit;
00028     if (index < n._get_length()) {
00029         digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00030         return ((n._get_digit(index) & mask) != 0);
00031     } else return false;
00032 }
00033 
00034 void setbit(base_integer& n, size_t bit) {
00035     if (n._is_fixed() && bit >= n._fixed_bits()) return;
00036 
00037     n._make_unique();
00038 
00039     size_t index = bit / bits_per_digit;
00040     if (index >= n._get_length()) n._realloc(index+1);
00041 
00042     digit_t mask = (digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00043     n._get_writable_digits()[index] |= mask;
00044     n._cleanup();
00045 }
00046 
00047 void clearbit(base_integer& n, size_t bit) {
00048     if (n._is_fixed() && bit >= n._fixed_bits()) return;
00049 
00050     size_t index = bit / bits_per_digit;
00051     if (index < n._get_length()) {
00052         n._make_unique();
00053         digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00054         n._get_writable_digits()[index] &= ~mask;
00055         n._cleanup();
00056     }
00057 }
00058 
00059 size_t lowestbit(const base_integer& n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00060     if (n._is_zero()) return valueIfZero;
00061 
00062     const digit_t *p=n._get_digits(), *pe=p+n._get_length();
00063     while (p!=pe && *p==0) ++p;
00064 
00065     size_t index=(p - n._get_digits());
00066     size_t r=(bits_per_digit * index);
00067     digit_t digit=*p;
00068 
00069     while ((digit & 0x01)==0) {
00070         digit>>=1;
00071         ++r;
00072     }
00073 
00074     return r;
00075 }
00076 
00077 size_t highestbit(const base_integer& n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00078     return (n._is_zero() ? valueIfZero : n._log2()-1);
00079 }
00080 
00081 void bitwise_and(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const
00082     base_integer& n2)
00083 {
00084     bool n1larger=(n1._get_length() > n2._get_length());
00085     const base_integer &smaller(n1larger ? n2 : n1),
00086         &larger(n1larger ? n1 : n2);
00087 
00088     size_t maxlen = (std::min)(smaller._get_length(), target._get_max_length());
00089 
00090     target._make_unique();
00091     target._realloc(maxlen);
00092 
00093     const digit_t *s1 = smaller._get_digits(), *s1e = s1 + maxlen, *s2 =
00094         larger._get_digits();
00095     digit_t *t = target._get_writable_digits();
00096 
00097     while (s1 < s1e) *t++ = *s1++ & *s2++;
00098 
00099     target._cleanup();
00100 }
00101 
00102 void bitwise_or(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const
00103     base_integer& n2)
00104 {
00105     bool n1larger = (n1._get_length() > n2._get_length());
00106     const base_integer &smaller(n1larger ? n2 : n1), &larger(n1larger ? n1 : n2);
00107 
00108     size_t maxlen = (std::min)(larger._get_length(), target._get_max_length());
00109 
00110     target._make_unique();
00111     target._realloc(maxlen);
00112 
00113     const digit_t *s1 = smaller._get_digits(), *s1e = s1 +
00114         (std::min)(smaller._get_length(), maxlen);
00115     const digit_t *s2 = larger._get_digits(), *s2e = s2 + maxlen;
00116     digit_t *t = target._get_writable_digits();
00117 
00118     while (s1 < s1e) *t++ = *s1++ | *s2++;
00119     while (s2 < s2e) *t++ = *s2++;
00120 
00121     target._cleanup();
00122 }
00123 
00124 void bitwise_xor(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const
00125     base_integer& n2)
00126 {
00127     bool n1larger=(n1._get_length() > n2._get_length());
00128     const base_integer &smaller(n1larger ? n2 : n1), &larger(n1larger ? n1 : n2);
00129 
00130     size_t maxlen = (std::min)(larger._get_length(), target._get_max_length());
00131 
00132     target._make_unique();
00133     target._realloc(maxlen);
00134 
00135     const digit_t *s1 = smaller._get_digits(), *s1e = s1 +
00136         (std::min)(smaller._get_length(), maxlen);
00137     const digit_t *s2 = larger._get_digits(), *s2e = s2 + maxlen;
00138     digit_t *t = target._get_writable_digits();
00139 
00140     while (s1<s1e) *t++ = *s1++ ^ *s2++;
00141     while (s2<s2e) *t++ = *s2++;
00142 
00143     target._cleanup();
00144 }
00145 
00146 void shift_left(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00147     if (byBits==0) {
00148         target._attach(n);
00149         return;
00150     }
00151 
00152     size_t bytes = byBits / bits_per_digit, bits = byBits % bits_per_digit;
00153     size_t nlen = n._get_length();
00154 
00155     temp_t answer(target, n._get_length() + bytes + 1);
00156     digit_t *tgt = answer._get_writable_digits();
00157     size_t anslen = answer._get_max_length();
00158 
00159     const digit_t *src = n._get_digits();
00160 
00161     // bits/bytes is distance to move
00162     // nlen is one greater than top source byte to move
00163     nlen = (std::min)(nlen, anslen - bytes - (bits != 0 ? 1 : 0));
00164 
00165     if (bits != 0 && bytes+1 < anslen) {
00166         // Handle both bits and bytes in one pass
00167         const digit_t *s = src + nlen - 1;
00168         digit_t *t = tgt + nlen + bytes;
00169 
00170         *t-- = *s >> (bits_per_digit - bits);
00171         while (s > src) {
00172             *t = (*s-- << bits);
00173             *t-- |= (*s >> (bits_per_digit - bits));
00174         }
00175         *t = (*s << bits);
00176     } else if (bytes != 0 && bytes+1 < anslen) {
00177         memcpy(tgt + bytes, src, sizeof(digit_t) * nlen);
00178     }
00179     answer._cleanup();
00180     answer._set_negative(n._get_negative());
00181     target._attach(answer);
00182 }
00183 
00184 void shift_right(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00185     if (byBits==0) {
00186         target._attach(n);
00187         return;
00188     }
00189 
00190     size_t bytes = byBits / bits_per_digit, bits = byBits % bits_per_digit,
00191         bits2 = bits_per_digit - bits;
00192 
00193     temp_t answer(target, n._get_length() + bytes + 1);
00194     digit_t *tgt = answer._get_writable_digits();
00195 
00196     size_t nlen = n._get_length();
00197     const digit_t *src = n._get_digits();
00198     if (bytes < nlen) {
00199         if (bits != 0) {
00200             // Handle both bits and bytes in one pass
00201             const digit_t *s = src + bytes, *se = src + nlen - 1;
00202             digit_t *t = tgt;
00203             while (s!=se) {
00204                 *t = (*s++ >> bits);
00205                 *t++ |= (*s << bits2);
00206             }
00207             *t = (*s >> bits);
00208         } else if (bytes != 0) {
00209             memcpy(tgt, src + bytes, sizeof(digit_t) * (nlen - bytes));
00210         }
00211     }
00212     answer._cleanup();
00213     answer._set_negative(n._get_negative());
00214     target._attach(answer);
00215 }

00299 integer bitwise_and(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00300     integer r;
00301     detail::bitwise_and(r, n1, n2);
00302     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00303 }

00329 integer bitwise_xor(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00330     integer r;
00331     detail::bitwise_xor(r, n1, n2);
00332     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

00334 
00345 integer shift(const integer& n, int byBits) {
00346     if (byBits > 0) return shift_left(n, byBits);
00347     else return shift_right(n, -byBits);
00348 }
00349 
00359 integer shift_left(const integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00360     integer r;
00361     detail::shift_left(r, n, byBits);
00362     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00363 }
00364 
00374 integer shift_right(const integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00375     integer r;
00376     detail::shift_right(r, n, byBits);
00377     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00378 }
